thread.title: Dollar Tree Swings to a Loss, Though Sales Soar After Deal
thread.title_full: Dollar Tree Swings to a Loss, Though Sales Soar After Deal - WSJ

author: Lisa Beilfuss
title: Dollar Tree Swings to a Loss, Though Sales Soar After Deal
text:
Dollar Tree Inc. swung to a loss in its latest quarter, though sales jumped, as the discount retailer integrates its recently-acquired rival.
Shares in the company fell 5.3% in premarket trading, erasing much of their year-to-date gain.
The Virginia-based chain, which in July completed its $9 billion acquisition of Family Dollar Inc.,... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
